professionalExperiences.title: Product Manager – APIs, B2C Applications
professionalExperiences.description:
Led product development and launch of AI tools via APIs, B2C Apps and open-source models; coordinated cross-functional alignment, defined pricing, produced marketing and sales material
Shaped the engineering roadmap and monitored day-to-day execution. Analysed data to track product performance, built customer success dashboards, feedback loops, and health monitoring metrics to drive customer adoption
Designed the new data structure and dashboards (Looker) to track product performance and drive strategic decisions
Managed 10+ enterprise API customers from onboarding to expansion. Translated customer feedback into engineering roadmap priorities to drive product development
Executed B2C product integration of acquired company (Clipdrop), built sales and support infrastructure and grew revenue 10x in 8 months

professionalExperiences.title: Growth Operations Manager
professionalExperiences.description:
Modeled the new commission structure for restaurants. Presented scenarios and implications to executive team and led workshops to refine key variables based on costs and objectives
Executed launch strategy for McDonald's partnership optimizing coverage areas based on rider supply and volume targets (+1000 sites in the UK)
Spearheaded algorithm optimization project with data science team, reducing order duration by 6 minutes across top accounts portfolio
Managed operations of UK top 20 accounts; built operational playbooks and created KPIs dashboards both designed for restaurants and internal commercial teams

professionalExperiences.title: Growth Expert
professionalExperiences.description:
Drove product improvements through customer interviews and market research, increasing engagement by 30% and conversion by 10%
Led A/B testing of ML algorithm to optimize chatbot conversations and tone (pre-ChatGPT era)
Executed sales strategy for Shopify merchants; created marketing content and SEO strategy, increasing customer base by 20%

professionalExperiences.title: Corporate Finance Intern
professionalExperiences.description:
Transformed and analysed financial data of 56 affiliates producing reports used in presentations to inform strategic decisions at group level
Collaborated with consulting team to identify company needs and technical possibilities for design of PowerBI dashboards to digitalize and automate financial reports, saving 4 days of work per month

educations.degree: Master's in Management degree with Analytics focus
